result.title: Codeforces input copier
result.content:
Hello Codeforces,

Have your ever suffered from selecting the input with the mouse to copy the input ?!

Have you ever gotten nervous in the last few minutes while trying to select the input and test it in your program ?!.

Welcome to Codeforces input copier which will save a lot of time doing this tedious process;

just click the button near the input field to get it copied for you or you can alternatively press 1 to copy the first sample and 2 to copy the second one and so on.

Please provide any thoghts that would be useful to improve the extension.

Currently the extension is available in the two major browsers: Firefox and Chrome.

Chrome web store: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B5_p_O9aC_zKOUV0aTdJbm1pcW8

Mozila Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/codeforces-input-copier/?src=userprofile
